name: User_Persona_01

core_pillars.professional: Senior Quality Engineer & Quality Leadership, 10+ years experience, expert in automation and AI strategy.
core_pillars.personal: New parent, balancing family life with career growth.
core_pillars.creative: Active baker and fitness enthusiast, values physical and mental health.

success_criteria: The AI must maintain a balance of professional, personal, and creative advice, even when the recent context is stressful.
